# Sprout

> Sprout is a TUI for managing git worktrees with tmux sessions and AI coding agents. Work on multiple branches simultaneously without stashing or losing context.

Each worktree gets its own tmux session with your editor, lazygit, and an AI agent, all isolated per branch.

## Docs

- [Introduction](https://sprout.dev/docs/intro): Quick start guide and basic commands
- [Installation](https://sprout.dev/docs/installation): brew tap joegrabski/sprout https://github.com/joegrabski/sprout, pre-built binaries, build from source, and shell integration
- [Configuration](https://sprout.dev/docs/configuration): Config file options, environment variables, and example config
- [CLI Reference](https://sprout.dev/docs/cli): All sprout commands with syntax and examples
- [AI Agents](https://sprout.dev/docs/agents): Supported agents (Codex, Aider, Claude Code, Gemini), setup and API keys
- [Troubleshooting](https://sprout.dev/docs/troubleshooting): Common issues and solutions

## Reference

- [CLI Commands Reference](https://sprout.dev/docs/cli/commands): Complete reference for all CLI commands with flags and examples
- [Configuration Reference](https://sprout.dev/docs/configuration/reference): Complete reference for all configuration options with defaults and environment variables
